mapper.update: update message set m_title = #{mTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_question = #{mQuestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_answer = #{mAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, q_user_id = #{qUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, a_user_id = #{aUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, q_user_name = #{qUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_user_name = #{aUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, q_time = #{qTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a_time = #{aTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select m_id, m_title, m_question, m_answer, q_user_id, a_user_id, q_user_name, a_user_name, q_time, a_time from message where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select m_id, m_title, m_question, m_answer, q_user_id, a_user_id, q_user_name, a_user_name, q_time, a_time from message
